title: 07/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin examines new information that Aaron Rodgers will be coming back to Green Bay this year and turned down a massive extension to stay with the team. The Bucks are on the brink of starting a dynasty tonight but don't overlook the breaks they've gotten along the way. Although Aaron Rodgers is trapped with the Packers this season, once he leaves, he'd rather retire than play for a bad team. Plus, there's a big difference between the winning success of Tom Brady and Aaron Rodgers!


Guest: Cuttino Mobley

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
